text: The sixth and last identified RCT729 comparing adjuvant chemotherapy alone versus chemotherapy plus whole pelvic radiation therapy in patients with FIGO stages IB-IIA who underwent radical hysterectomy and pelvic lymphadenectomy was also prematurely closed due to less than optimal accrual.
